testcase.classname: Comment Tests: Test Comment Endpoint
testcase.name: Create a Comment using a post request
testcase.system-out: When I perform post operation to create a Comment...........................passed Then the status response code must be 201...................................passed And the returned post data must contain the Id..............................passed And the status in the body must be "Created"................................passed

testcase.classname: Comment Tests: Test Comment Endpoint
testcase.name: Validate Schema of a Comment
testcase.system-out: When I perform GET operation to get Comment data by id "3"..................passed Then I should get a valid schema And body parameters should be valid........passed

testcase.classname: Comment Tests: Test Comment Endpoint
testcase.name: Validate Schema of a Comment 2
testcase.system-out: When I perform GET operation to get Comment data by id "5"..................passed Then I should get a valid schema And body parameters should be valid........passed

testcase.classname: Comment Tests: Test Comment Endpoint
testcase.name: Validate the number of records in response of Comments
testcase.system-out: When I perform GET operation to get All Comments............................passed Then the status response code must be 200...................................passed And the response should have 500 number of records..........................passed

testcase.classname: Comment Tests: Test Comment Endpoint
testcase.name: Delete comment with id
testcase.system-out: When I perform delete operation on a comment with id "3"....................passed Then the status response code must be 200...................................passed And the status in the body must be "OK".....................................passed

testcase.classname: Comment Tests: Test Comment Endpoint
testcase.name: Delete comment with id 2
testcase.system-out: When I perform delete operation on a comment with id "5"....................passed Then the status response code must be 200...................................passed And the status in the body must be "OK".....................................passed

testcase.classname: Comment Tests: Test Comment Endpoint
testcase.name: Test delete Comment with invalid/null id
testcase.system-out: When I perform delete operation on a comment with id "".....................passed Then an error status code must be returned..................................passed

testcase.classname: Comment Tests: Test Comment Endpoint
testcase.name: Test delete Comment with invalid/null id 2

failure.message: 1 expectation failed. Expected status code (<404> or <400> or <301> or <500>) but was <200>.

testcase.failure:
When I perform delete operation on a comment with id "%$^#".................passed Then an error status code must be returned..................................failed

testcase.name: Get a single User data using id
